text: Wario Land is a series of video games. It is part of the Wario series, which in turn is a part of the Super Mario franchise. All the games feature Wario as protagonist. ==Games== The following is a chronological list of all games in the Wario Land series: *Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3 (1994, Game Boy) *Virtual Boy Wario Land (1995, Virtual Boy) *Wario Land II (1998, Game Boy) *Wario Land 3 (2000, Game Boy Color) *Wario Land 4 (2001, Game Boy Advance) *Wario Land: The Shake Dimension (2008, Wii) ==References== Category:Wario Category:Nintendo video games
title: Wario Land series
